title: Herbs & Homeopathy
author: Sign In
description: With thousands of years behind them, it's no wonder that herbs have even earned such a respected place in the world of medicine - even in modern medicine. Used to treat a variety of ailments to prevent disease and for overall health, herbs originate from natural sources such as plant leaves, bark, berries and flowers and roots. That's why, generally speaking, herbs are much safer and easier on the body than most prescription drugs.
